content: this oh so soft easy crochet washcloth pattern is absolutely my favourite crochet washcloth pattern to make and also my favourite dishcloth pattern to make i love that it can be made in a simple elegant stitch giving it a spa like feel or in multiple colours giving it a shabby chic or farmhouse feel this crochet washcloth / dishcloth pattern is worked in row if making the washcloth or dishcloth bigger or smaller make sure you keep the beginning chain a multiple of 2 works up great in any worsted weight yarn two achieve striping change colours at every row if you can do single_crochet chain stitch and double_crochet you can make this pattern in american crochet terms skill level is easy
